title: 10 Hot AF Celebrity Dude Instagram Accounts To Follow Right Now
text:
facebook 544 SHARES 
The temperatures may be dropping down (up here in the North, anyway; Bombay, 19 degrees doesn't count), and we know just how to get things heated up. Here are 10 gorgeous men who can scorch a room in an instant! Indulge yourself in a little eye-candy and get your fingers ready to hit that follow button right away! 1. Sushant Singh Rajput 
So not only does this man happen to be a fabulous actor reaching new heights every day, he also owns a body that can bowl you over! See what we did there? 
So baby pull me closer in the back seat of your Rover We ain't ever getting older...üéºüéº 2. Saqib Saleem 
Seems like there is so much more to the already charming Saqib Saleem. Cue, the sculpted abs! His Instagram feed is a proof! Did we tell you he also has an equally adorable dog? 
Sometimes it's just about the mood #ripped 3. Vicky Kaushal 
This boy-next-door who won our hearts with his masterpiece, Masaan hides a lot under those clothes! The perfect definition of tall, dark and handsome, ain't he? 
Blame it on @shivajistormsen for my narcissism üòÅüôàüòá 4. Jim Sarbh 
Speculated as Kalki Koechlin's boyfriend, this theatre director-turned-actor who debuted with Neerja in an outstanding performance is the perfect beauty-brains combination! Look at that picture! Just. Look. 
@errikosandreou üì∑. 'The Future' by Leonard Cohen. 5. Rahul Khanna 
You're definitely living under a rock if you are unaware of this man and more than that, his beauty. Stalking his Instagram profile has to become your new hobby! 
Thanks, @bombay.rosie for the kind words about my account (and for giving my friends ammunition for the merciless teasing they've subjected me to all day)! üôàLink on my Twitter. (Photo: @sheetalmall) 6. Karan Singh Grover 
Bipasha Basu may have married Karan for a million reasons; his God-like body has to be one of them. If you prefer your guy all tatted up, this is him! 
Where I belong... #aussiemonkeys 7. Sooraj Pancholi 
If not his debut movie, something that did work for Sooraj was Salman's advice to go for an enviable, box-office slaying body. We have no complaints! 8. Rohit Khandelwal 
Crowned Mister World 2016, this man's body is like a dream! 
With him on your feed, good days are guaranteed. See, he got us all rhyming and poetic! 9. Nitin Chauhan 
Like your boys with the perfect mane? This Greek God of a model is definitely your guy. 
Sharing my latest stylish watch...gifted by @danielwellington ...sleek and elegant design üòç guys if u want to own this watch use my code"Nitin". view this entire collection at www.danielwellington.com #nitinchauhan #danielwellington #watch #gift #manbun #bodyshot #beardlifestyle #indianmodel #lovemywatch #hairstyle 10. Prabh Uppal 
Owning the most gorgeous bod, it is actually kind of alarming how handsome this model is! Like seriously, this is the face that needs to be on your feed all day, every day!
